description.value:
You call upon the red lightning that carved the will of the Celestial Heaven upon the cliffs of Tanghai to punish those who threaten your comrade.

Encounter âœ¦ Divine, Lightning, Radiant, Runic, Weapon

Standard Action • Area burst 2 centered on an ally within 5 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning and radiant damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the attacks of the ally on whom the burst was centered deal lightning and radiant damage, in addition to their normal types.

Rune of Destruction: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Strength modifier.

Rune of Protection: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to his or her healing surge value equal to your Strength modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 404.
